languages.text: {n}По лицу культистки пробегает тень.{/n} "Если... если найдешь на то минуту... поговори со мной в спокойном месте. Мне нужно облегчить душу перед тобой, Домин'{name}".
languages.translation_comment: Играется, если у игрока активен романс с Кибеллой

traits.locale_text: {n}По лицу культистки пробегает тень.{/n} "Если... если найдешь на то минуту... поговори со мной в спокойном месте. Мне нужно облегчить душу перед тобой, Эним'{name}".
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.translation_comment: Играется, если у игрока активен романс с Кибеллой

languages.text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}По лицу культистки пробегает тень.{/n} "Если... если найдешь на то минуту... поговори со мной в спокойном месте. Мне нужно облегчить душу перед тобой, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow crosses her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere quieter. There is too much weighing on my soul, Enim'{name}."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow crosses her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere quieter. There is too much weighing on my soul, Enim'{name}."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Schatten verdunkelt ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Wenn ... wenn Ihr einen Augenblick Zeit hättet ... Ich würde gerne mit Euch sprechen, unter vier Augen. Es lastet zu viel auf meiner Seele, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schatten verdunkelt ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Wenn ... wenn Ihr einen Augenblick Zeit hättet ... Ich würde gerne mit Euch sprechen, unter vier Augen. Es lastet zu viel auf meiner Seele, Domin'{name}."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una sombra oscurece su rostro.{/n} «Si... si puede dedicarme un momento... me gustaría que hablara conmigo en un lugar más privado. La carga de mi alma es muy pesada, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sombra oscurece su rostro.{/n} «Si... si puede dedicarme un momento... me gustaría que hablara conmigo en un lugar más privado. La carga de mi alma es muy pesada, Domin'{name}».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}影が彼女の顔を暗くする。{/n}「もし…もし少しでも時間があれば…私と話をしてほしいの。どこかもう少し人のいない場所で。余りにも重たいものが私の魂にのしかかってきているの、ドミン・{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}影が彼女の顔を暗くする。{/n}「もし…もし少しでも時間があれば…私と話をしてほしいの。どこかもう少し人のいない場所で。余りにも重たいものが私の魂にのしかかってきているの、エニム・{name}」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}阴影遮住了她的脸。{/n}“如果……如果你可以抽出一点时间……我希望你能和我谈谈，找个更私密的地方。我的灵魂承受了太多压力，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}阴影遮住了她的脸。{/n}“如果……如果你可以抽出一点时间……我希望你能和我谈谈，找个更私密的地方。我的灵魂承受了太多压力，秘者{name}。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une ombre s'abat sur son visage.{/n} « Si... si vous avez un petit instant à m'accorder... J'aimerais m'entretenir avec vous en tête-à-tête. Trop de choses pèsent sur mon âme, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre s'abat sur son visage.{/n} « Si... si vous avez un petit instant à m'accorder... J'aimerais m'entretenir avec vous en tête-à-tête. Trop de choses pèsent sur mon âme, Domin'{name}. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yüzüne bir gölge düşüyor.{/n} "Eğer... Eğer ayırabileceğin biraz zamanın varsa... Seninle özel olarak konuşmak istiyorum. Ruhuma ağırlık yapan çok fazla şey var Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow darkens her face.{/n} "If... if you can find a moment to spare... I would ask that you speak with me, somewhere more private. There is too much weighing on my soul, Domin'{name}."
